product_metadata.product_name: Bajaj Life Goal Based Saving III
product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal allowed during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Goal Based Saving III is a market-linked ULIP designed to provide wealth accumulation and life protection. It offers additional allocation in the first year, return of life cover charges (ROMC) up to 125%, settlement payouts, liquidity through withdrawals, and zero premium allocation/admin charges.
key_highlights: Additional Allocation up to 3% in the first policy year
Return of Mortality Charges (ROMC) up to 125% at maturity
Wide range of funds with unlimited free switching
Partial withdrawals available after 5 policy years
Settlement Option for maturity or death benefit in installments
Plan flexibility: option to reduce premium or change premium paying term
No Premium Allocation Charge and No Policy Administration Charge

plan_variants.additional_allocation: 3% of each modal premium in year 1

core_benefits.details: Fund Value payable on maturity if all premiums are paid. Option available for lump sum or installment payout under Settlement Option.
Higher of Prevailing Sum Assured or Fund Value, plus higher of Top-up Sum Assured or Top-up Fund Value.
core_benefits.guarantee: Minimum Guaranteed Death Benefit = 105% of Total Premiums Paid including Top-ups.
core_benefits.note: Sum Assured reduced to extent of partial withdrawals made in last 2 years before death.

core_benefits.details: Extra allocation added at premium allocation in first policy year.
At maturity, all mortality charges deducted are returned with a multiplier based on premium slab.

charges_structure.mortality_charge: Deducted monthly by cancellation of units
charges_structure.female_advantage: Female lives get age setback of 3 years

discontinuance_charge.regular_limited: Up to max ₹6,000 depending on premium slab (Nil after year 5)
discontinuance_charge.single_premium: Up to max ₹6,000 depending on premium slab (Nil after year 5)

partial_withdrawal.maximum: 50% of Regular Fund Value (25% for Single Premium)

change_ppt.condition: Must be exercised before existing PPT expiry

riders.rider_name: Linked New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

compliance_guardrails.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. NAV may go up or down.
compliance_guardrails.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI guidelines.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_guardrails.suicide_exclusion: Within 12 months, nominee receives Fund Value as on death intimation date.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: Beware of spurious phone calls. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to prevailing Income Tax laws.

retrieval_chunks.text: Goal Based Saving III has Nil Premium Allocation Charge and Nil Policy Administration Charge, making it a low-cost ULIP.
In the first policy year, 3% of each modal premium (or 1% single premium) is added back into fund value as Additional Allocation.
ROMC returns mortality charges at maturity with multiplier up to 125% depending on annualized premium band.
Partial and systematic withdrawals are allowed after 5 years lock-in, minimum ₹5,000, supporting liquidity needs.
Maturity or death benefits can be taken in installments up to 5 years with Return Enhancer of +0.5% per payout.
